description: Celtic are linked with a move for highly rated Aston Villa forward Louie Barry in the January transfer window.
title: Scottish transfer gossip: Louie Barry, James McAtee, Lyall Cameron
title_page: Scottish transfer gossip: Louie Barry, James McAtee, Lyall Cameron - BBC Sport
maintext:
Celtic have been linked with a move for highly rated Aston Villa forward Louie Barry in the January transfer window. (The Scotsman), external
Another of Celtic's transfer targets, Manchester City playmaker James McAtee, looks to be edging closer to a January loan move to German club Mainz. (TalkSport), external
Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers expects to find out the progress of his January transfer targets this week. (The Herald), external
Roman Eremenko, who Rubin Kazan paid Â£13m for in 2011, has flown to Scotland and could sign for St Johnstone this week. (Scottish Sun), external
Rangers are working on a pre-contract agreement with Dundee playmaker Lyall Cameron. (The Courier), external
